title: Advanced ECG Interpretation Education Program Based on Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental nursing knowledge and understanding of biosignal measurement principles
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining personal-device-based online modules with offline simulation workshops, featuring team projects based on real clinical cases

learning_goals: Learners can interpret the basic waveforms and clinical significance of 12-lead ECGs with 85% accuracy
Learners can distinguish ECG patterns by arrhythmia type and explain emergency response protocols.
Learners can apply ECG interpretation skills to real-world clinical scenarios through PBL team projects.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
